SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Lead the compliance function, ensuring adherence to regulatory standards. 
 Develop and implement comprehensive compliance programs. 
 Conduct risk assessments and compliance audits. 
 Manage a team of compliance professionals. 
 Collaborate with senior management to integrate compliance into business strategies. 
 Key Achievements : 
 Implemented a new compliance monitoring system, reducing breaches by 25%. 
 Led a major regulatory investigation, successfully mitigating potential risks.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Highly experienced Head of Compliance with 18 years in the banking sector. Expertise in regulatory compliance, risk management, and the development and implementation of comprehensive compliance programs. Proven track record in leading teams, conducting detailed risk assessments, and ensuring adherence to complex regulatory requirements.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Laura has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Compliance Officers. and has been currently working for HSBC Bank Head of Compliance for the last 8.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Laura holds a Mid Management Level position, as Senior Compliance Manager at Barclays Bank. from 01/01/2013 to 31/12/2016. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Laura holds a Mid Management Level position, as Compliance Manager at Lloyds Banking Group. from 01/01/2010 to 31/12/2013. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.
